org.artoolkit.ar.base

Class ARToolKit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.artoolkit.ar.base.ARToolKit

  • public class ARToolKit
extends java.lang.Object
    The ARToolKit class is a singleton which manages access to the underlying native functions defined in the NativeInterface class. Native calls should be made only from within this class so that adequate error checking and correct type conversion can take place.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ARToolKit getInstance()
        Implementation of the singleton pattern to provide a sole instance of the ARToolKit class.
        Returns:
        The single instance of ARToolKit.

      • initialiseNative

        public boolean initialiseNative(java.lang.String resourcesDirectoryPath)
        Initialises the native code library if it is available.
        Parameters:
        resourcesDirectoryPath - The full path (in the filesystem) to the directory to be used by the native routines as the base for relative references. e.g. Activity.getContext().getCacheDir().getAbsolutePath() or Activity.getContext().getFilesDir().getAbsolutePath()
        Returns:
        true if the library was found and successfully initialised.

      • nativeInitialised

        public boolean nativeInitialised()
        Returns whether the native library was found and successfully initialised. Native functions will not be called unless this is true.
        Returns:
        true if native functions are available.

      • initialiseAR

        public boolean initialiseAR(int videoWidth,
                            int videoHeight,
                            java.lang.String cameraParaPath,
                            int cameraIndex,
                            boolean cameraIsFrontFacing)
        Initialises the ARToolKit using the specified video size.
        Parameters:
        videoWidth - The width of the video image in pixels.
        videoHeight - The height of the video image in pixels.
        cameraParaPath - The full path (in the filesystem) to a camera parameter file, or the path expressed relative to the resourcesDirectoryPath set in initialiseNative().
        Returns:
        true if initialisation was successful.

      • updateDebugBitmap

        public Bitmap updateDebugBitmap()
        Gets an updated debug image buffer from the native library and uses it to update the local color array. This is then applied to the debug Bitmap, which can be displayed in the user interface.
        Returns:
        The debug image Bitmap.

      • getDebugBitmap

        public Bitmap getDebugBitmap()
        Returns the Bitmap containing the ARToolKit debug video image.
        Returns:
        The debug video Bitmap.

      • setDebugMode

        public void setDebugMode(boolean debug)
        Enables or disables the debug video image in ARToolKit.
        Parameters:
        debug - Whether or not to enable the debug video image.

      • getDebugMode

        public boolean getDebugMode()
        Returns whether the ARToolKit debug video image is enabled.
        Returns:
        Whether the ARToolKit debug video image is enabled.

      • setThreshold

        public void setThreshold(int threshold)
        Sets the threshold used to binarize the video image for marker detection.
        Parameters:
        threshold - The new threshold value in the range 0 to 255.

      • getThreshold

        public int getThreshold()
        Returns the threshold used to binarize the video image for marker detection.
        Returns:
        The current threshold value in the range 0 to 255, or -1 if the threshold could not be retrieved.

      • getProjectionMatrix

        public float[] getProjectionMatrix()
        Returns the projection matrix calculated from camera parameters.
        Returns:
        Projection matrix as an array of floats in OpenGL style.

      • addMarker

        public int addMarker(java.lang.String cfg)
        Adds a new single marker to the set of currently active markers.
        Parameters:
        patt - The path to the pattern file to load.
        width - The physical width of the marker being tracked, in millimeters.
        Returns:
        The unique identifier (UID) of the new marker, or -1 on error.

      • queryMarkerVisible

        public boolean queryMarkerVisible(int markerUID)
        Returns whether the marker with the specified ID is currently visible.
        Parameters:
        markerUID - The unique identifier (UID) of the marker to query.
        Returns:
        true if the marker is visible and tracked in the current video frame.

      • queryMarkerTransformation

        public float[] queryMarkerTransformation(int markerUID)
        Returns the transformation matrix for the specifed marker.
        Parameters:
        markerUID - The unique identifier (UID) of the marker to query.
        Returns:
        Transformation matrix as an array of floats in OpenGL style.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Returns true when video and marker detection are running.
        Returns:
        true when video and marker detection are running, otherwise false

      • convertAndDetect

        public boolean convertAndDetect(byte[] frame)
        Takes an incoming frame from the Android camera and passes it to native code for conversion and marker detection.
        Parameters:
        frame - New video frame to process.
        Returns:
        true if successful, otherwise false.

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Instructs the native code to free resources.
